scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up

scriptsDescriptions.EXPLANATION: dummy object only used to comment built scripts(will be ignored by npm) -> TODO
scriptsDescriptions.preinstall: wipe all leaf node_modules before install in monorepo root node_modules(node_modules dependencies already should be hoisted using workspaces. TODO: check in the future if it is a npm bug)
scriptsDescriptions.services: script for designated workspaces TODO: way to run with regex @pkg/*
scriptsDescriptions.wipe: wipe all temporary files from packages(and node_modules because dependencies should be hoisted using workspaces. TODO: check in the future if it is a npm bug)
scriptsDescriptions.docker:up: start development containers (alias for docker-compose command)
scriptsDescriptions.docker:up:clean: recreate and start development containers (alias for docker-compose command)
scriptsDescriptions.docker:down: stop development containers (alias for docker-compose command)
scriptsDescriptions.docker:down:clean: stop development containers and delete it's data/images (alias for docker-compose command)
scriptsDescriptions.docker:sh: start shell in development container (alias for docker-compose command)
scriptsDescriptions.docker:bash: start shell in development container (alias for docker-compose command)
scriptsDescriptions.aws: aws cli command for localstack container (alias for aws-cli localstack)
scriptsDescriptions.aws:ddb: aws cli command for local dynamodb container (alias for aws-cli local dynamodb)
